name: sucssel
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wss(csuc(c0), c2), wcel(c0, c2)))

stmt.pretty: syl5com(c0 ∈ c1, suc(c0)⊆ c2, c0 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ suc(c0))

comment: A set whose successor is a subset of another class is a member of that class. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-1995.)
